content: this is an easy to make washcloth pattern it s good for beginners to practice the crochet technique or for advanced crocheters who just want to whip up a quick gift it uses the stitches - chain single_crochet & double_crochet - that s all it s so very easy you can use just one colour yarn or two if you wanted to add a finishing pop of colour for the border if you wanted to make your own washcloth pattern like this - just pick up a crochet techniques book & check out all the different crochet stitches/patterns and whammo before you know it you ll have made your very own pattern & picked up some more crochet techniques good luck although you won t need it & i can t wait to hear about any washcloths that you have made
